title: To Combat Sexual Assault, Women Are Resorting to Electric Shock Underwear
description: Devices to address attacks on women—from panic buttons to lipstick guns—are proliferating. But what about the underlying causes of sexual violence?
content: Sexual violence is a complex cocktail Psychology trauma cultural conditioning power dynamics and a million other causal details come together to form a crisis for which it seems only a similarly complex social solution will do Forty years ago social chars
